Micah 5:2 - Ruler from Bethlehem

Source Verse: Micah 5:2 Summary: A ruler will come from Bethlehem, prophesied to be the Messiah. Type: Direct Category: Birth Fulfilled: Yes Confidence: High

This prophecy is fulfilled in the birth of Jesus Christ in Bethlehem, as recorded in the New Testament. Historical Evidence: The Amarna Letters (14th century BCE) provide historical evidence of Canaanite cities like Bethlehem, supporting the biblical context of Micah 5:2. See Amarna Letters Evidence for more details.
